title: Claims settlement agreements and releases
dataVerified: Claimant name, insurer, settlement amount, release terms, attorney details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered settlement agreements (changing payment amounts post-signature). Domain binding verifies insurer/law firm. Legal contract. Prevents reopening settled claims. Audit trail for bad faith litigation.
